Module the_project
Package room

Class Room

java.lang.Object
room.Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeluxeRoom, DoubleRoom, SingleRoom, VIPSuite
public abstract class Room extends Object
Follows the Liskov Substitution principle as this superclass is replaceable with all its subclasses; and the programme would still has its functionality >>>>>>> Stashed changes
Since:
2022-03-15
Version:
7.0
Author:
Isaac, Yan kai, Davis, Wenlu, Tomoki

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Room(Menu menu, TypeOfBed bedType, ViewType viewType, int numOfBed, boolean wiFi, boolean smokeOut, double weekDayPrice, double weekEndPrice)
    Instantiation of the Room object This includes details such as the menu type of bed, view type, number of bed, whether if there are wifi, whether if smoking is allowed, the price of room for each weekday booked and the price of room for each weekend booked Room's availability status is set as VACANT upon instantiation a newly created RoomService object as this room's room service order, Feature object as this room's features, Rate object as this room's charged rate and initializes these objects to null/zero by default; Instantiates RoomFeatures object and RoomRate object; Follows the Single Responsibility principle as sole responsibility to instantiate a Room object;

    void
    reset(Reservation reservation)
    Resets this room upon check out by guest(s) previously staying in this room by resetting roomService object (essentially the array of orders and total bill of orders) and roomFeature object of this room; Availability status of this room is set to VACANT if no more existing reservations after current and set to RESERVED if there are still more reservations; Used by Check out function; Follows the Single Responsibility principle as sole responsibility to reset this Room object;

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(Menu menu, TypeOfBed bedType, ViewType viewType, int numOfBed, boolean wiFi, boolean smokeOut, double weekDayPrice, double weekEndPrice)
      Instantiation of the Room object This includes details such as the menu type of bed, view type, number of bed, whether if there are wifi, whether if smoking is allowed, the price of room for each weekday booked and the price of room for each weekend booked Room's availability status is set as VACANT upon instantiation a newly created RoomService object as this room's room service order, Feature object as this room's features, Rate object as this room's charged rate and initializes these objects to null/zero by default; Instantiates RoomFeatures object and RoomRate object; Follows the Single Responsibility principle as sole responsibility to instantiate a Room object;
      Parameters:
      menu - this contains the food items available to this room
      bedType - this is the type of bed in this room. The enumeration for the bedType are SINGLE, QUEEN and KING
      viewType - this is the type of view that a Room object has, that the guest is able to view from his room The enumeration for the viewType are STANDARD, OCEAN, CITY
      numOfBed - this is the number of beds in this room, used to initialize RoomFeatures;
      wiFi - this is the availability of wifi in this room. wiFi; if indicated as 'true' means that there is wifi services in the room. else if there is no wifi services in the room, it would be indicated as 'false'
      smokeOut - this is the ability to smoke in this room. smokeOut; if indicated as 'true' means that smoking is allowed. else if there is smoking is not allowed, it would be indicated as 'false'
      weekDayPrice - this is the bill incurred for the booking for each weekday under the instantiated room
      weekEndPrice - this is the bill incurred for the booking for each weekend under the instantiated room

  • Method Details

    • getRoomType

      public TypeOfRoom getRoomType()
      gets type of room of this room;
      Returns:
      type of this room: SINGLE, DOUBLE, DELUXE or VIPSUITE;

    • getAvail

      public AvailStatus getAvail()
      gets availability status of this room;
      Returns:
      availability status of this room: VACANT, OCCUPIED, RESERVED, UNDER_MAINTENANCE;

    • getRoomFeatures

      public RoomFeatures getRoomFeatures()
      gets RoomFeature object of this room containing features of this room (bedType, viewType, numOfBed, wifi, smokeOut);
      Returns:
      RoomFeature object of this room;

    • getRoomNum

      public String getRoomNum()
      gets room number of this room;
      Returns:
      this.roomNumber: room number of this room;

    • getMaxOccupancy

      public int getMaxOccupancy()
      gets maximum number of guests allowed to stay in this room;
      Returns:
      this.maxOccupancy: maximum number of occupants in this room;

    • getRate

      public RoomRate getRate()
      gets price per day of stay of this room;
      Returns:
      charged rate of this room;

    • getMenu

      public Menu getMenu()
      gets Menu object containing food list available for room service of this room;
      Returns:
      Menu object containing menu items for this room;

    • getReservation

      public Reservation getReservation()
      gets Reservation object of this room containing reservation details of this room;
      Returns:
      if reservation has been made for this room, returns Reservation object that has reservation details of this room; if not, returns null;

    • getRoomService

      public RoomService getRoomService()
      gets RoomService object of this room containing room service order details of this room;
      Returns:
      RoomService object of this room containing room service order details of this room;

    • setAvail

      public void setAvail(AvailStatus availability)
      sets availability status of this room;
      Parameters:
      availability - availability status of this room: VACANT, OCCUPIED, RESERVED, UNDER_MAINTENANCE;

    • setReservation

      public void setReservation(Reservation reservation)
      sets reservation of this room using Reservation object;
      Parameters:
      reservation - Reservation object containing reservation details of this room;

    • reset

      public void reset(Reservation reservation)
      Resets this room upon check out by guest(s) previously staying in this room by resetting roomService object (essentially the array of orders and total bill of orders) and roomFeature object of this room; Availability status of this room is set to VACANT if no more existing reservations after current and set to RESERVED if there are still more reservations; Used by Check out function; Follows the Single Responsibility principle as sole responsibility to reset this Room object;
      Parameters:
      reservation - Reservation object of this room
